summary.span: 代表可依索引個別存取的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了如所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全如所述， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable 功能：** 因為它繼承自類別，類別會提供數個特殊功能：物件可以宣告為在多個物件之間共用，成為唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，而變更為安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements**oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements* 一或多個宣告使用物件元素語法的物件。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為物件衍生自，一起使用時將它們複製。Because objects derive from , they are copied when they are used. 因此，您可能無法稍後擷取，或移除您加入使用原始的集合物件;集合中是一份原始而且被視為不同比您所加入。Therefore, you might not be able to later retrieve or remove the you added to the collection using the original object; the in the collection is a copy of the original and is considered a different than the one you added. 不同於一般的實作，此實作會擲回如果您嘗試新增**null** (**Nothing**) 參考。Unlike typical implementations of , this implementation throws an if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection/Enumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回可逐一查看這個集合的列舉程式。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An that can iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 列舉值無法用來修改基礎集合中。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉值位於集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 也會列舉值帶回至這個位置中。also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，您必須呼叫列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 設定下一個項目。 sets to the next item. 傳遞集合的結尾後，列舉值會放置在集合中，最後一個項目之後和呼叫傳回`false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要設定集合一次的第一個項目，您可以呼叫後面。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉值將失效且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，會傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改集合中，這會導致擲回例外狀況的列舉值。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
